title: All-Inclusive Fiji Private Island Paradise
description:
Be submerged in all-inclusive luxury like never before with an utterly unique stay amid the deep blue of the South Pacific Ocean at Kokomo Private Island Fiji. Perfectly poised beachfront, cradled by the Great Astrolabe Reef, this secluded island resort perfectly fuses luxury and privacy with the bounty of space - and generosity of time to do as much or as little as your heart desires.

The passion project of Australian billionaire, Lang Walker AO, this ultra-luxe retreat offers a truly five-star experience. Reconnect with nature and plunge into the crystal clear waters of the resort’s house reef, experience euphoria at the spa with a rejuvenating treatment, spend each morning aligning your chakras at the yoga studio or indulge your senses at the resort’s three restaurants, where island-grown and locally sourced produce is championed. Live the good life in the resort's private pool villas, boasting beautiful spaces bathed in natural light and vistas across the verdant surrounds.
